newsitem.title: TAIWAN: TAIWAN STOCKS - factors to watch - August 5.
newsitem.headline: TAIWAN STOCKS - factors to watch - August 5.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Taiwan stocks on Tuesday:
* Recent rally bellwether electronics should steam ahead on sound profit reports by leading firms.
* Microchip maker Winbond raises 1997 pre-tax profit forecast to T$2.43 billion from T$550 million.
* Other sectors not as bullish, especially amid tightened liquidity due to high money rates, brokers say
* Monday's overnight interbank rate at 7.499 percent against Saturday's 6.277.
* Alex Yang, analyst, National Securities: "Basically, it will be electronics trying to carry the market again, because the tight liquidity will not induce overall buying."
* Commercial Times newspaper reports computer giant Acer Inc receives big orders from IBM. Acer declines comment.
